## Install

```bash
$ npm i egg-crypto --save
```

## Usage

```js
// app/controller/home.js

'use strict';

const Controller = require('egg').Controller;

class HomeController extends Controller {
  async index() {
    this.ctx.body = this.ctx.crypto.MD5('Hi, egg-crypto');
  }
}

module.exports = HomeController;
```

## List

- ```md5```
- ```sha1```
- ```sha256```
- ```sha224```
- ```sha512```
- ```sha384```
- ```sha3```
- ```ripemd160```

---

- ```hmac-md5```
- ```hmac-sha1```
- ```hmac-sha256```
- ```hmac-sha224```
- ```hmac-sha512```
- ```hmac-sha384```
- ```hmac-sha3```
- ```hmac-ripemd160```

---

- ```pbkdf2```

---

- ```aes```
- ```tripledes```
- ```rc4```
- ```rabbit```
- ```rabbit-legacy```
- ```evpkdf```

---

- ```format-openssl```
- ```format-hex```

---

- ```enc-latin1```
- ```enc-utf8```
- ```enc-hex```
- ```enc-utf16```
- ```enc-base64```

---

- ```mode-cfb```
- ```mode-ctr```
- ```mode-ctr-gladman```
- ```mode-ofb```
- ```mode-ecb```

---

- ```pad-pkcs7```
- ```pad-ansix923```
- ```pad-iso10126```
- ```pad-iso97971```
- ```pad-zeropadding```
- ```pad-nopadding```
